articles.author: Catherine Belton, Francesca Ebel, Ellen Francis
articles.title: How Putin, ex-KGB officer, will seek to sway Trump at Alaska summit - The Washington Post
articles.description: European officials are nervous that in this one-on-one meeting, Putin will once again succeed in flattering Trump and flip the narrative away from Russia’s invasion.
articles.content: When President Donald Trump and President Vladimir Putin meet in Alaska on Friday, the Russian leader and former KGB officer will draw on decades of experience seeking to charm and manipulate foreign… [+75 chars]
